wearFactorTooltip:
Whether and how quickly equipment wears out.
It takes x uses of the item for it to wear out once, where x is the wear rate.
In the case of a weapon, this would mean it would lose one damage.
A wear factor of zero or smaller means it is deactivated.
wearFactorDescription:
An equipment wears out after {{wearFactor}} uses.
A weapon will loose one damage after {{wearFactor}} uses and a piece of armor will loose one armor after {{wearFactor}} uses.
